value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Why must it always be so insufferably
hot in Múspell?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Loki...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Princess Laegjarn! What exquisite
timing you have. Shall we retire to
the baths? I'm so...grimy.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I wish you'd let me take care of you
and your darling little sister. I would
like nothing more...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I can take care of Laevatein.$k$p$EFace_Anger|And I'll also take care of anyone who
lays a hand on her. Consider yourself
warned.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|So, no bath, then?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I have had my fill of your foolishness,
Loki. What brings you here?$k$pI know that you have not sworn your
loyalty to my father. I suspect an
ulterior motive.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|So what? The king seems pleased
enough with my assistance.$k$pIf you would like to know what I really
want... I'll give you a riddle to solve. If
you get it right, I'll reveal...everything.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I doubt I could make sense of any
riddle you'd dream up.$k$pI've already wasted enough time
trying to puzzle you out.$k$pIt seems as though you operate on
caprice and whim alone.$k$pI have little doubt you'd throw away
everything if the mood struck you.$k$pYou are a creature of chaos.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Darling! I'd no idea you'd taken such
an interest in me. I'm touched.$k$pBut I am afraid we're out of time.
There are some adorable brides who
I'm aching to meet...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Where are you going now?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, never mind that, dear. It's...
just one of my little secrets.$k$pLet's just call it the heart of the chaos
and leave it at that!$k$p

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|The Tempest is already sputtering
out... How sad.$k$pThose brides were so adorable. I
wasn't done with them...$k$pOh, well. I'll console myself with the
thought that no matter who wins,
well...$k$p$EFace_Smile|You know what? I think I'll keep that
one to myself for now. I know you're
listening, dear. Come on out.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Princess Laevatein! You were spying
on me. I'm shocked! Did your grouchy
sister put you up to it?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No. It was my idea.$k$pLoki... If you hurt her... I will get you.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|The love shared between sisters is
such a beautiful thing.$k$p$EFace_Pain|But it's also a bit sad! So strong, this
love is, that you two just can't open up
to me...$k$pYour own mother!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?$k$pNo... Not true! ...Is it?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Of course it isn't, dear. You are just as
cute as can be! So pure of heart...$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You—$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Now, now, Princess. You are so
adorable that I feel myself dying
to tell you my secrets...$k$pYou don't need to worry about me,
dear. My goal is the same as your
dear father's...$k$p$EFace_Anger|The destruction of Askr.$k$p
